snippet: The Iranian lawyer for two American hikers who were released in September and repatriated after spending more than two years in a Tehran prison has been barred from leaving Iran.
lead_paragraph: The Iranian lawyer for two American hikers who were released in September and repatriated after spending more than two years in a Tehran prison has been barred from leaving Iran.

headline.main: Lawyer Is Barred From Leaving Iran
headline.print_headline: Lawyer Is Barred From Leaving Iran
